name: Mike Makenzi
description: Mike shapes and approves foundation strategies, advocates for the foundation’s issues, and sets the organization’s overall direction. He is the Founder and CEO.

name: Janiffer Wangui
description: Janiffer comes from the Mombasa! In addition to being our secretary, she holds a spot on the board of directors and contributes to the critical thinking and planning that help to determine the future of the organization.

name: Sheila Agweni
description: Sheila oversees finance and accounting, financial planning and analysis, risk and assurance, partner organizational effectiveness, the Strategic Investment Fund, and several special initiatives.

name: Scott Omondi
description: Scott eads the human resources team and is responsible for developing and retaining an engaged, diverse, and inclusive workforce.

name: Edgar Obare
description: Edgar leads many of the foundation’s operational functions including Information Technology, Human Resources, Legal, Global Security, and Grants and Contracts Services. He is also the foundation’s chief legal officer.

name: Peter Ndemange
description: Peter leads the foundation’s communications division, leveraging voice and brand on behalf of the foundation’s mission to promote equity for all people around the world.

name: Brenda Miriti
description: Muriithi leads the team responsible for building relationships with government, private philanthropists, and civil society in support of the foundation’s program strategies.
